greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = prime(n+4) - prime(n).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) =  A031131(n) + A031131(n+2) = A001223(n) + A031165(n+1) and obvious variants. - _M. F. Hasler_, Dec 03 2018
mathematica: a=4; t=Array[Prime,123]; Drop[t,a]-Drop[t,-a] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 13 2009 *)
results.author: _Jeff Burch_
ext: Offset changed from 2 to 1, and a(1)=9 added, by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 23 2011
